details:
iwlwifi: fix use-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit ddd46059f7d99119b62d44c519df7a79f2e6a515, it was introduced in version v5.15.17 by commit e23f075d77987de4215c8e0696f28bcc707506f7. For more details please see the references link.
